name: 8-BIT BUCCANEER
description:
A pirate-themed roguelike game, in which you sail around, buy treasure maps, dig up treasure, and fight enemy ships and monsters. 

_____________________________________________________________
GAME CONTROLS:
Arrow keys - Move around 
Space - Fire cannon, dig when on land 
R - Reload cannon 
M - Hold to show map
_____________________________________________________________

This game was created for LOWREZJAM, a game jam involving games fitting in a 64x64 pixel window

(Currently, the pub and the upgrades in the shop are non-functional, but I'll fix that shortly)
